segments.text: Well , thank you.Mr.Parry , for all your information.Just one more question .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you play any sports or games ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used to play football regularly when I was at university.And I used to do athletics in the summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And what athletics did you play ? Can you remember ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was a runner_a long-distance runner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I'm afraid I haven't had time since I got married .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , thank you again for coming to see us.But just remember that we like people who join the company to play in the company sports teams .
segments.speaker: S1
